miniapp.name: Terminal
miniapp.subtitle: Command-line to-dos
miniapp.description: A retro command-prompt to-do list. Type commands like add: buy milk and x: 1 to mark done. Fast, fun, and daily-use friendly.
miniapp.ogDescription: A retro command-prompt to-do list. Type commands like add: buy milk and x: 1 to mark done. Fast, fun, and daily-use friendly.
